content: introducing the inspired by color afghan by jeanne steinhilber it s our annual stitch-along for boxing day december 26th that will last for four weeks in keeping with this year s goals of rectangle-shaped blankets jeanne and i looked at christmas wrapping paper to pull inspiration for colours for the rectangle version of course there will be requests for the square version jeanne went into her wheelhouse of favourite blues and neutral tones that she loves for that version both versions using red heart super saver
